list.txt: Cats are probably the smartest animals on Earth.
Nothing is as loyal or steadfast as your family dog.
Calico is a name for black and white mixtures.
I am not a real big fan of Brown. The whole earth tone thing is beyond me.
I have had both Black cats and Black Dogs
Grey dogs like greyhounds are regal looking while Grey cats are snuggly
Get Serious. Green Cats and dogs? Like a Chia pet? Save this one for the lizard.
Yellow or off white tends to be a favorite for cats and dogs alike
Unlike Green, certain cats and dogs do have a blueish tint to them.
White. Pure and untouched. A good color for cats but not so much for dogs.
If this were real this would give you some more search features
